body:
pizza party on friday night at kh's with all my best fronds before s went back to australia

that the pizza i ordered in advance came late, which built some hype, but it generally lived up to the hype

waking up and having breakfast on saturday morning, but then spending the rest of it drifting in and out of reading magazines and sleeping

the food cart pod where we went for lunch yesterday and for the impossibly tender braised pork shank from the thai street food cart

that every thai restaurant i eat at here is better than any thai restaurant i had ever eaten at before moving here

leftover yellow curry and rice for dinner and thin crispy chocolate chip cookies for dessert

the movie _high life,_ which i didn't "like" per se but had a pretty wild juliette binoche performance that i  appreciated

rereading _the handmaid's tale_ in advance of reading _the testaments_ 

this morning, they closed an 8 mile loop of streets in our neighborhood to cars and d and i found a break in the rain and went for a nice peaceful ride

i cleaned my office, which was a disaster area, and did two loads of laundry

trying to reduce my supplement regime, since i think some of them make me feel worse rather than better

it seemed for a bit like i was getting sick but it has mostly passed

trying to reduce my supplement regime, since i think some of them make me feel worse rather than better

it seemed for a bit like i was getting sick but it has mostly passed
